languages.text: {n}Кассия горько улыбается.{/n} "Трон новатора Дома Орселлио более не будет пустовать. Но... я жалею лишь об одном — мне придется покинуть ваш корабль и межзвездную тьму, что я так полюбила. Надеюсь, вы будете навещать меня, {name}".

{n}Cassia smiles bitterly.{/n} "The throne of the Novator of House Orsellio will no longer sit empty. But... my only regret is that I shall have to leave your ship and the darkness between the stars that I have come to love so much. I hope you will visit me, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия горько улыбается.{/n} "Трон новатора Дома Орселлио более не будет пустовать. Но... я жалею лишь об одном — мне придется покинуть ваш корабль и межзвездную тьму, что я так полюбила. Надеюсь, вы будете навещать меня, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia smiles bitterly.{/n} "The throne of the Novator of House Orsellio will no longer stand empty. But... my only regret is that I will have to leave your ship and the darkness between the stars that I have come to love so much. I hope you will visit me, {name}."

{n}Cassia smiles bitterly.{/n} "The throne of the Novator of House Orsellio will no longer stand empty. But... my only regret is that I will have to leave your ship and the darkness between the stars that I have come to love so much. I hope you will visit me, {name}."

{n}Cassia smiles bitterly.{/n} "The throne of the Novator of House Orsellio will no longer sit empty. But... my only regret is that I shall have to leave your ship and the darkness between the stars that I have come to love so much. I hope you will visit me, {name}."

{n}Cassia smiles bitterly.{/n} "The throne of the Novator of House Orsellio will no longer sit empty. But... my only regret is that I shall have to leave your ship and the darkness between the stars that I have come to love so much. I hope you will visit me, {name}."

{n}Cassia smiles bitterly.{/n} "The throne of the Novator of House Orsellio will no longer sit empty. But... my only regret is that I shall have to leave your ship and the darkness between the stars that I have come to love so much. I hope you will visit me, {name}."

languages.text: {n}卡西娅露出了苦涩的笑容。{/n}“奥赛罗家族大族长的宝座必须有人继任。然而……我唯一的遗憾是，我将不得不离开你的船，离开群星之间的黑暗，离开我所深爱的一切。我希望你以后能常来看看我，{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia smiles bitterly.{/n} "The throne of the Novator of House Orsellio will no longer sit empty. But... my only regret is that I shall have to leave your ship and the darkness between the stars that I have come to love so much. I hope you will visit me, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅露出了苦涩的笑容。{/n}“奥塞罗家族大族长的宝座必须有人继任。然而……我唯一的遗憾是，我将不得不离开你的船，离开群星之间的黑暗，离开我所深爱的一切。我希望你以后能常来看看我，{name}。”

languages.text: {n}Cassia sonríe con amargura.{/n} «El trono de la Novator de la casa Orsellio aguarda a su heredera... Solo me arrepiento de tener que abandonar la nave y la oscuridad entre las estrellas que he aprendido a amar tanto. Espero que venga a visitarme, {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia smiles bitterly.{/n} "The throne of the Novator of House Orsellio will no longer sit empty. But... my only regret is that I shall have to leave your ship and the darkness between the stars that I have come to love so much. I hope you will visit me, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia sonríe con amargura.{/n} «El trono de la Novator de la casa Orsellio aguarda a su heredera... Solo me arrepiento de tener que abandonar la nave y la oscuridad entre las estrellas que he aprendido a amar tanto. Espero que venga a visitarme, {name}».

languages.text: {n}カシアは苦笑いを浮かべる。{/n}「オルセリオ家のノベイターの王座は、空席ではなくなるわ。でも...唯一の心残りは、愛してやまないあなたの船と、楽しんできた星々の闇を後にしなければならないことだわ...必ず会いにきてくださいね{name}」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia smiles bitterly.{/n} "The throne of the Novator of House Orsellio will no longer sit empty. But... my only regret is that I shall have to leave your ship and the darkness between the stars that I have come to love so much. I hope you will visit me, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは苦笑いを浮かべる。{/n}「オルセリオ家のノベイターの王座は、空席ではなくなるわ。でも...唯一の心残りは、愛してやまないあなたの船と、楽しんできた星々の闇を後にしなければならないことだわ...必ず会いにきてくださいね{name}」

languages.text: {n}Cassia lächelt verbittert.{/n} "Der Novatorenthron des Hauses Orsellio wird nicht länger leer stehen. Ich ... bereue es nur, dass ich Euer Schiff verlassen muss, und die Dunkelheit zwischen den Sternen, die ich so zu lieben gelernt habe. Ich hoffe, Ihr werdet mich besuchen, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia smiles bitterly.{/n} "The throne of the Novator of House Orsellio will no longer sit empty. But... my only regret is that I shall have to leave your ship and the darkness between the stars that I have come to love so much. I hope you will visit me, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia lächelt verbittert.{/n} "Der Novatorenthron des Hauses Orsellio wird nicht länger leer stehen. Ich ... bereue es nur, dass ich Euer Schiff verlassen muss, und die Dunkelheit zwischen den Sternen, die ich so zu lieben gelernt habe. Ich hoffe, Ihr werdet mich besuchen, {name}."

languages.text: {n}Cassia sourit avec amertume.{/n} « Il est temps pour moi de prendre ma place sur le trône du Novator de la maison Orsellio. Dommage que je doive pour ce faire quitter votre vaisseau et ces ténèbres intersidérales auxquelles je me suis tant attachée. J'espère que vous viendrez me rendre visite, {name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia smiles bitterly.{/n} "The throne of the Novator of House Orsellio will no longer sit empty. But... my only regret is that I shall have to leave your ship and the darkness between the stars that I have come to love so much. I hope you will visit me, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia sourit avec amertume.{/n} « Il est temps pour moi de prendre ma place sur le trône du Novator de la maison Orsellio. Dommage que je doive pour ce faire quitter votre vaisseau et ces ténèbres intersidérales auxquelles je me suis tant attachée. J'espère que vous viendrez me rendre visite, {name}. »
